abstract: A federal jury in Manhattan has found Bank of America liable in a securities fraud trial that centered on the sales of asset-backed securities and involved some of the biggest names on Wall Street, The New York Times’s Lynnley Browning reported.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury in Manhattan has found Bank of America liable in a securities fraud trial that centered on the sales of asset-backed securities and involved some of the biggest names on Wall Street, The New York Times’s Lynnley Browning reported.

headline.main: Investors Win $141 Million in Suit Against Bank of America
